Portland.John Deere Plow Company Building:
The John Deere Plow Company Building is a building in southeast Portland, Oregon listed on the National Register of Historic Places.


== Further reading ==
K. Zisman; J. Koler; J. Morrison; B. Grimala; A. Yost (August 15, 1988). "National Register of Historic Places Inventory/Nomination: John Deere Plow Company Building" (pdf).
